verses.roman:
prabhura ājñāya nityānanda gauḍe calilā
tāṅra saṅge tina-jana prabhu-ājñāya āilā

synonyms: prabhura ājñāya—under the order of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda; gauḍe—to Bengal; calilā—went back; tāṅra saṅge—in His company; tina jana—three men; prabhu-ājñāya—under the order of the Lord; āilā—went.
translation: By the order of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, three devotees accompanied Lord Nityānanda Prabhu when He returned to Bengal to preach.
